name: Feed the queen!
description:
Well, I'd say this isn't too bad for my first game jam. 

The game's clearly unfinished, but it's still playable with probably a few bugs.

You play an ant working in a colony and gather food for your queen!

 There should have been more interacting items but I wasn't able to implement them in time, so at this point you can only feed a the queen. ^^

Hope you enjoy!
